levelList.name: A.B.S Max Attunement 【Degraded Corrosion】

[WhenUse] Deal +7.5% damage for every 5 [Combustion] on self (max 30%)
[WhenUse] At 10+ ([Combustion] on self + [Combustion] on target), Base Power +1
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 30% missing HP on self (max 2)
[BeforeAttack] Atk Weight +1 for every 20% missing HP on self (max 2)
